item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

2. My washing machine refreshed my thinking on software estimation (175 points | 136 comments)
3. The Joy of Nand2Tetris (112 points | 29 comments)

7. On David Lynch's Revenge of the Jedi (2018) (192 points | 72 comments)

12. Visualize Ownership and Lifetimes in Rust (131 points | 24 comments)
13. Why can't we remember our lives as babies or toddlers? (90 points | 97 comments)
14. Setting up a trusted, self-signed SSL/TLS certificate authority in Linux (116 points | 25 comments)

21. Grok3 Launch [video] (224 points | 335 comments)
22. You're not a senior engineer until you've worked on a legacy project (2023) (675 points | 376 comments)

24. The Generative AI Con (113 points | 127 comments)

27. Why Quantum Cryptanalysis is Bollocks [pdf] (85 points | 67 comments)
28. Find Your 2%Ers (2023) (107 points | 31 comments)
29. TestRigor (YC S21) Is Hiring VP of Engineering ( | hide)
